value.content: The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's codecId property is a string which uniquely identifies the object that was inspected to produce the data in the RTCCodecStats for the RTP stream.

value.title: Value
value.content: A string which uniquely identifies the object from which the contents of the stream's RTCCodecStats are derived.

doc.summary:
The RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary's
  codecId property is a string which uniquely identifies
  the object that was inspected to produce the data in the RTCCodecStats
  for the RTP stream.
doc.pageTitle: RTCRtpStreamStats: codecId property - Web APIs | MDN
